title: Shein are thieves! Never refunded me for my return!
text: I returned some items and now Shein is not even refunding me properly even though it has been over a whole month now. I tried contacting customer service and still nobody is helping to refund it properly. They just kept repeating the same thing telling me to wait for 7 days after the return was delivered. It has been way over 7 days already. I clearly explained that and provided them with the order number and return proof, and they completely ignored what I was saying and kept repeating the same exact thing. I kept having to explain and they just ignored what I was telling them about how long it was taking. I have tried creating a ticket to contact them 5 times now and I‚Äôm still not getting my refund. They just beat around the bush and are avoiding acknowledging what I‚Äôm saying about how long it‚Äôs taking. The worst part is that they removed live chat from their app so now I have to keep creating tickets over and over again and nobody is helping still. They keep closing the ticket after they are repeating telling me to wait 7 days. It has been 40 days since my return was delivered to them. So they stole my money. I have been repeatedly trying to contact them about this for the last month and still nothing. Horrible!! I will never shop here again! PLEASE DO NOT SHOP AT SHEIN!!!
